select
distinct
from yzl_xb
order by ${orderByClause}

= #{chl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHL_DJ = #{chlDj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YBD = #{ybd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HSMJ = #{hsmj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BHSMJ = #{bhsmj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HGMJ = #{hgmj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CLMJ = #{clmj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DBZMJ = #{dbzmj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BHGMJ = #{bhgmj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SSMJ = #{ssmj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BHSYY = #{bhsyy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WCLYY = #{wclyy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM `yzl_xb` xb INNER JOIN yzl_district d ON xb.`COUNTY`=d.`Anumber` where xb.county in
#{anumber}
GROUP BY xb.county
mapper.sql: stat,xb.id,xb.city as "cityNumber",xb.county as "countyNumber",GCLB,ZLLB,JHND,ZYND,sum(XTJSBMJ) as "XTJSBMJ",d.city as "cityName",d.county as "countyName"
city,county,gclb,zllb,zynd, SUM(XTJSBMJ) AS XTJSBMJ,SUM(HSMJ) AS HSMJ ,SUM(HGMJ)HGMJ,SUM(SJYLMJ) AS SJYLMJ,SUM(HSYLMJ) AS HSYLMJ,SUM(CLMJ) AS CLMJ
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT city FROM yzl_xb WHERE stat = #{stat} AND ZYND = #{year}

if.test: menu.size > 0 and disCode.length() != 2 and disCode.length() != 6 and disCode != null
menu.size == 0 or disCode.length() == 2 or disCode.length() == 6 or disCode == null

mapper.select: SELECT city,county,GCLB,ZLLB,JHND,ZYND,stat,SUM(XTJSBMJ) AS XTJSBMJ FROM yzl_xb GROUP BY GCLB,ZLLB,JHND,ZYND HAVING 1=1 AND stat = #{stat} AND ZYND = #{year} AND city = #{city} and GCLB = #{eid}
SELECT DISTINCT city FROM yzl_district WHERE cityCode = #{city}
SELECT Anumber FROM yzl_district WHERE flag = #{nid} OR dcode = #{nid}

SELECT DISTINCT ZLLB FROM yzl_xb WHERE ZYND = #{year} AND stat = #{stat} AND GCLB = (
SELECT mark FROM yzl_epc WHERE ename = #{ename})
and county in
#{number}

SELECT GCLB ,ZLLB,cityCode,countyCode,ZYND,JHND, SUM(taskProgress) AS taskProgress FROM yzl_epc_task_progress WHERE GCLB = #{gclb} AND ZLLB = #{zllb} AND countyCode LIKE "%"#{county}"%" AND ZYND = #{zynd} AND JHND = #{jhnd}

SELECT DISTINCT GCLB FROM yzl_epc_task_progress WHERE zllb = #{tcode} AND ZYND = #{year} AND stat = #{stat}
AND countyCode like "%"#{nid}"%"

if.test: menu.size > 0 and disCode.length() != 2 and disCode.length() != 6 and disCode != null
menu.size == 0 or disCode.length() == 2 or disCode.length() == 6 or disCode == null

mapper.select: SELECT city,county,SUM(xb.`XTJSBMJ`) as "XTJSBMJ",xb.`ZLLB` FROM yzl_xb xb GROUP BY xb.`ZLLB`,xb.`county`
SELECT SUM(XTJSBMJ) FROM yzl_xb where stat=#{statu};
